name: verum-omnis-app
description: Verum Omnis - The World's First Legal AI

scripts.android:prepare: mkdir -p www && cp index.html www/ && cp -r assets www/ && cp favicon.png www/
scripts.android:add: npm run android:prepare && npx cap add android
scripts.android:sync: npm run android:prepare && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build:release: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease

author: Liam Highcock
